title: Girl, 4, apparently shot herself in the hand, police report
content:
A 4-year-old girl apparently shot herself in the hand Monday afternoon in an far east Fort Worth apartment.
Police were called to apartments in the 1200 block of Susan Avenue about 3 p.m. Monday after a 911 caller reported the shooting, according to online police reports.
Police spokesman Daniel Segura said the preliminary investigation showed that the child’s injuries were not life-threatening.
While unable to release information about the specific patient, Matt Zavadsky, a spokesman for MedStar, said that a patient was transported from the area to Cook Children’s Medical Center.
Segura said Crimes Against Children detectives will investigate to determine if the child’s guardians may face charges.
Mark David Smith: 817-390-7808, @MarkSmith_FWST
